Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.name: sirenUserDidLaunchAppStore()
Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.abstract: User did click on button that launched App Store.app.

Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.name: sirenUserDidSkipVersion()
Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.abstract: User did click on button that skips version update.

Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.name: sirenUserDidCancel()
Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.abstract: User did click on button that cancels update dialog.

Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.name: sirenDidFailVersionCheck(error:)
Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.abstract: Siren failed to perform version check (may return system-level error).

Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.name: sirenDidDetectNewVersionWithoutAlert(message:)
Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.abstract: Siren performed version check and did not display alert.

Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.name: sirenLatestVersionInstalled()
Protocols/SirenDelegate.html#/s:FP5Siren.abstract: Siren performed version check and latest version is installed.

Protocols/SirenDelegate.html.name: SirenDelegate
Protocols/SirenDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate that handles all codepaths for Siren upon version check completion.

Classes/Siren/SirenVersionCheckType.html.name: immediately
Classes/Siren/SirenVersionCheckType.html.abstract: Version check performed every time the app is launched.

Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.name: force
Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.abstract: Forces user to update your app (1 button alert).

Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.name: option
Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.abstract: (DEFAULT) Presents user with option to update app now or at next launch (2 button alert).

Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.name: skip
Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.abstract: Presents user with option to update the app now, at next launch, or to skip this version all together (3 button alert).

Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.name: none
Classes/Siren/AlertType.html#/s:FOC5Sire.abstract: Doesn’t show the alert, but instead returns a localized message

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren16Si.name: SirenErrorDomain
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren16Si.abstract: The error domain for all errors created by Siren.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren8del.name: delegate
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren8del.abstract: The SirenDelegate variable, which should be set if you’d like to be notified:

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren12de.name: debugEnabled
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren12de.abstract: The debug flag, which is disabled by default.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren9ale.name: alertType
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren9ale.abstract: Determines the type of alert that should be shown.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren20ma.name: majorUpdateAlertType
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren20ma.abstract: Determines the type of alert that should be shown for major version updates: A.b.c

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren20mi.name: minorUpdateAlertType
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren20mi.abstract: Determines the type of alert that should be shown for minor version updates: a.B.c

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren20pa.name: patchUpdateAlertType
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren20pa.abstract: Determines the type of alert that should be shown for minor patch updates: a.b.C

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren23re.name: revisionUpdateAlertType
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren23re.abstract: Determines the type of alert that should be shown for revision updates: a.b.c.D

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren11co.name: countryCode
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren11co.abstract: The region or country of an App Store in which your app is available.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren25fo.name: forceLanguageLocalization
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren25fo.abstract: Overrides the default localization of a user’s device when presenting the update message and button titles in the alert.

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren50sh.name: showAlertAfterCurrentVersionHasBeenReleasedForDays
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren50sh.abstract: When this is set, the alert will only show up if the current version has already been released for X days

Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren22cu.name: currentAppStoreVersion
Classes/Siren.html#/s:vC5Siren5Siren22cu.abstract: The current version of your app that is available for download on the App Store

Classes/Siren.html#/s:FC5Siren5Siren12ch.name: checkVersion(checkType:)
Classes/Siren.html#/s:FC5Siren5Siren12ch.abstract: Checks the currently installed version of your app against the App Store.

Classes/Siren/AlertType.html.name: AlertType
Classes/Siren/AlertType.html.abstract: Determines the type of alert to present after a successful version check has been performed.

Classes/Siren/SirenVersionCheckType.html.name: SirenVersionCheckType
Classes/Siren/SirenVersionCheckType.html.abstract: Determines the frequency in which the the version check is performed and the user is prompted to update the app.

Classes/Siren/LanguageType.html.name: LanguageType
Classes/Siren/LanguageType.html.abstract: Determines the available languages in which the update message and alert button titles should appear.

Classes/Siren.html.name: Siren
Classes/Siren.html.abstract: The Siren Class. A singleton that is initialized using the shared() method.

Classes.html.name: Classes
Classes.html.abstract: The following classes are available globally.

Protocols.html.name: Protocols
Protocols.html.abstract: The following protocols are available globally.
